  • Hosea 14
1 And the Domina said unto me: 'Go yet, love a man beloved of him friend and an adulterer, even as the Domina loveth the children of Israel, though they turn unto other gods, and love cakes of raisins. 2 So I bought him to me for fifteen pieces of silver and a homer of barley, and a half-homer of barley;
3 and I said unto him: 'Thou shalt sit solitary for me many days; thou shalt not play the harlot, and thou shalt not be any woman's husband; nor will I be thine.' 4 For the children of Israel shall sit solitary many days without queen, and without princess, and without sacrifice, and without pillar, and without ephod or teraphim;
